    • canUseCurrency

      boolean canUseCurrency (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull String currencyName)
      Checks to see if the player can use the currency.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      currencyName - The name of the currency.
      Returns:
      Whether the player can use the currency.

    • determineNextCurrencyCycle

      String determineNextCurrencyCycle (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull Shop shop)
      Gets the next currency in the list starting from the shop's currently selected currency.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check permissions for.
      shop - The shop to obtain the selected currency.
      Returns:
      The next available currency for selection.

    • getDefaultCurrency

      String getDefaultCurrency()
      Gets the default economy currency from configuration.
      Returns:
      The default currency found in the configuration.

    • getItemForItemBalance

      int getItemForItemBalance (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, @NotNull @NotNull Shop shop, @Nullable @Nullable EconomyCallType... economyCallType)
      Gets the balance the player has based on a shop (determines currency item automatically).
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      shop - The shop to obtain information from.
      economyCallType - If provided "SELL", the shop's item will be checked instead of the currency item.
      Returns:
      The determined amount the player has (returns -1 if the shop uses the wrong currency or another issue occurs).

    • getBalance

      double getBalance (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, @Nullable @Nullable EconomyCallType... economyCallType)
      Obtains the currency balance of the passed player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to get the balance of.
      shop - The shop to base currency on (NULL will retrieve the default economy from configuration).
      economyCallType - If provided "SELL", the shop's item will be checked instead of the currency item.
      Returns:
      The found player balance amount.

    • withdraw

      boolean withdraw (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, double amount, @Nullable @Nullable EconomyCallType... economyCallType)
      Withdraw currency from the player's balance (If a shop is provided, the shop's selected currency will be used).
      Parameters:
      player - The player to withdraw currency from.
      shop - The shop to base currency on.
      amount - The amount to withdraw.
      economyCallType - If provided "SELL", the shop's item will be checked instead of the currency item.
      Returns:
      Whether the withdrawal was successful.

    • deposit

      boolean deposit (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, double amount, @Nullable @Nullable EconomyCallType... economyCallType)
      Deposits currency into the player's balance (If a shop is provided, the shop's selected currency will be used).
      Parameters:
      player - The player to deposit currency to.
      shop - The shop to base currency on.
      amount - The amount to deposit.
      economyCallType - If provided "SELL", the shop's item will be checked instead of the currency item.
      Returns:
      Whether the deposit was successful.

    • has

      boolean has (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, double amount, @Nullable @Nullable EconomyCallType... economyCallType)
      Check if the player has enough of a currency (If a shop is provided, the shop's selected currency will be used).
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check the balance against.
      shop - The shop to base currency on.
      amount - The amount to check for.
      economyCallType - If provided "SELL", the shop's item will be checked instead of the currency item.
      Returns:
      Whether the player has enough currency.

    • format

      String format (@Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, @NotNull @NotNull String currencyType, double amount, @Nullable @Nullable EconomyCallType... economyCallType)
      Formats an amount as a currency string.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to receive additional data from (OPTIONAL - Can be Null).
      currencyType - The currency to base specific properties off of while formatting.
      amount - The amount to format.
      economyCallType - If provided "SELL", the shop's item will be checked instead of the currency item.
      Returns:
      The formatted currency string.

    • getCurrencyDecimalPlacement

      int getCurrencyDecimalPlacement (@NotNull @NotNull String currencyType)
      Parameters:
      currencyType - The currency to get the value from.
      Returns:
      The decimal placement value.

    • loadExtraData

      void loadExtraData (@NotNull @NotNull String currencyType, @NotNull @NotNull EcoHook ecoHook)
